      • scanReposForKarFiles

        public void scanReposForKarFiles()
        Search for Kar files in local Kar Repositories and build a list of all the KAR files that are found. This list can be retrieved using getKarFiles()

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setDefaultLocalRepos

        public void setDefaultLocalRepos()
        Set the default local repositories to be the kar directories for each of the modules in the system along with a default workflows directory.

      • setCheckpoint

        public void setCheckpoint()
        Save the local repo dirs to a private variable so we can determine when they have changed between build points.

      • restoreCheckpoint

        public void restoreCheckpoint()
        Reset the list of local repositories to be what it was the last time the setCheckpoint() method was called.

      • changedSinceCheckpoint

        public boolean changedSinceCheckpoint()
        Check to see if the LocalRepositories have changed since the last time setCheckpoint() was called.
        Returns:
        true if the local repositories have changed

      • isLocalRepositoryName

        public boolean isLocalRepositoryName(java.lang.String name)

      • removeLocalRepoRootDir

        public void removeLocalRepoRootDir(java.io.File directory)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method only removes the given directory from the in-memory repository list. To update the database you must call the synchronizeDB() method.
        Parameters:
        directory -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the directory could not be removed

      • synchronizeDB

        public void synchronizeDB()
        Synchronize the KAR_LOCAL_REPOS table with the _localRepositories private variable list. This method only removes rows from the table that are not in the list. It does not add rows to the table for extra entries that are in the list.

      • setLocalRepoName

        public void setLocalRepoName(java.io.File directory,
                             java.lang.String name)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Change the name of a local repository.
        Parameters:
        directory - the default root directory of the repository
        name -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Returns:

      • getContainingLocalRepository

        public LocalRepositoryManager.LocalRepository getContainingLocalRepository(java.io.File aFile)
        Given a file, return the local repository that it is in or null if it is not in a local repository. This also returns null if the file passed in is a local repository.
        Parameters:
        aFile -
        Returns:

      • addLocalRepoRootDir

        public void addLocalRepoRootDir(java.io.File directory,
                                java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Add a local repository for a given root directory and name. If a repository with that name already exists, the directory is added to the list of root directories for that repository.
        Parameters:
        directory -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
